text:
@SecPompeo We would support US if it takes action on #China Sir

We should take action in such a way that countries should fear to hide something from the world in future

#World's Poor & Middle Class Families have suffered a lot because of the lockdown

#CoronaVirusPandemic #MakeChinaPay
